contents.newMember: Hello @member.honorific@ @member.lastName@, I'm @user.firstName@ from Laguna Health. We partnered with @org.name@ to provide you free post-hospital recovery support. Click below to download the app and schedule the first check-in: @downloadLink@.
contents.newMemberNudge: Hello @member.honorific@ @member.lastName@, I'm @user.firstName@ from Laguna Health. Friendly reminder to download the app and schedule your first check-in: @downloadLink@.
contents.newRegisteredMember: Welcome to Laguna Health. To get started on your recovery journey schedule a check-in with your Laguna coach here.
contents.newRegisteredMemberNudge: Friendly reminder from @user.firstName@ at Laguna Health. I'm looking forward to supporting you on your recovery journey. To get started schedule your first check-in here.
contents.appointmentScheduled: Hello @member.honorific@ @member.lastName@, your appointment with @user.firstName@, your Laguna Health coach is scheduled for @appointment.time@.
contents.appointmentLongReminder: Reminder for @member.honorific@ @member.lastName@'s appointment on @appointment.time@ with @user.firstName@, your Laguna Health coach.
contents.appointmentReminder: Hello @member.honorific@ @member.lastName@, your appointment with @user.firstName@ from Laguna Health starts in @gapMinutes@ minutes
contents.appointmentRequest: Hello @member.honorific@ @member.lastName@, it's @user.firstName@, your Laguna Health coach. Click below to schedule your next meeting.
contents.newChatMessageFromUser: Your coach, @user.firstName@, sent you a new message.
contents.logReminder: Track your recovery progress, and share it with your your coach.
contents.newChatMessageFromMember: You have one new message from your member, @member.honorific@ @member.lastName@.
contents.appointmentUser: Hello @user.firstName@, an appointment has been added to your schedule on @appointment.start@.
contents.memberNotFeelingWellMessage: Your member, @member.honorific@ @member.lastName@, logged a score that requires your attention.
